title: According to you which are 3 best songs in the world ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well there are no “Best” songs in the world..there are so many different genres of music, you just cant pick specific songs, to be called “Best" However you use “According to you" so here's my pick: Bohemian rhapsody by Queen Kashmir, Stairway to heaven by Led Zeppelin Shine on you crazy diamond, Wish you were here, Comfortably numb by Pink floyd This list goes on ….that's why I said there are no specific “Best" songs

See you again by Charlie Puth featuring Wiz Khalifa Youth by Shawn Mendes featuring Khalid I Hope by Gabby Barrett featuring Charlie Puth See you again because it is relatable to everyone in a way or the other. Maybe it could be if someone close to you has passed away or you miss your friend who you had seen long ago and there are many other perspectives to look at it from. Youth because you have to do what you want to. Don't care about the things people say. People always find something bad in everything but you shouldn't care about what those bad comments are. I hope is a song about cheating but not everybody goes through that right? But when you hear it you feel like you have gone through that. It's a really good song.
